item.title: Iona strengthens to a Category 3 hurricane in the central Pacific off southern Hawaii
item.description: Hurricane Iona has strengthened to Category 3, several hundred miles south-southeast of Hawaii

item.title: Closing arguments set in trial of Colorado dentist accused of poisoning his wife
item.description: Lawyers are set to deliver closing arguments Tuesday in the trial of a Colorado dentist accused of killing his wife by poisoning her

item.title: Wall Street tiptoes around its records as its busy week picks up momentum
